Name: Passion Fruit Collins
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out flesh into shaker. Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.
Review: This fruity adaptation of the classic Collins may be a tad sharp for some: if so, add a dash more sugar.
History: For the full story behind the origins of the Collins and its many variations see our Collins page .
